text: The municipality of Sveti Križ Začretje is located in Krapina-Zagorje County, northern Croatia. Sveti Križ Začretje is a village in and a municipality of Krapina-Zagorje County in the Republic of Croatia. According to the 2011 census, there are 6,165 inhabitants of the area, the absolute majority of which are Croats. ==References== Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Sveti Križ Začretje
